mapper.sql: SELECT GB.GOODS_NO /* prGoodsBaseModLog.goodsBaseModListBase */ , GB.GOODS_NM , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR038',ML.GOODS_MOD_ITEM_CD ) AS GOODS_MOD_ITEM_CD_NM , ML.GOODS_MOD_CONT , ML.SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(ML.SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM FROM PR_GOODS_BASE_MOD_LOG ML , PR_GOODS_BASE GB , ET_ENTR_BASE EB WHERE ML.GOODS_NO = GB.GOODS_NO AND GB.ENTR_NO = EB.ENTR_NO AND ML.SYS_REG_DTM >= TO_TIMESTAMP( #{modStartDtm} || ' 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND ML.SYS_REG_DTM <= TO_TIMESTAMP( #{modEndDtm} || ' 23:59:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND ML.GOODS_MOD_ITEM_CD LIKE #{goodsModItemCd} || '%' AND ML.GOODS_NO LIKE #{goodsNo} || '%' AND GB.GOODS_NM LIKE #{goodsNm} || '%' ORDER BY GOODS_CHG_SEQ DESC
